snippet.title: Overcooked! 2 - Night Of The Hangry Horde Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The unbread have risen again and this time they’re hell-bent on attacking the Onion King’s castle... This is the Night Of The Hangry Horde (DLC)! Learn more: http://bit.ly/Overcooked2NOTHH

Night Of The Hangry Horde includes:

New game mode - Feed waves of enemies to protect the castle in brand new 'horde mode'!
New recipes & equipment - Use the brand new guillotine to chop ingredients for soup and stoke the castle furnaces with coal to bake fruit pies and cook tasty roast dinners!
New chefs - Cook up a spooky meal with the new ghost, vampire or werewolf chef. PLUS a returning favourite from the original Overcooked - Boxhead chef!
New kitchens - On top of the eight horde mode kitchens, you'll also get to take on the creepy culinary challenges of nine new themed kitchens PLUS three hidden Kevin kitchens!

Also available now is the Overcooked! 2 Season Pass. This includes access to Campfire Cook Off, Night Of The Hangry Horde, and one more piece of DLC launching for Overcooked! 2 in 2019.

Overcooked! 2 is available now on Steam, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4 and Xbox One.

Steam: http://bit.ly/Overcooked2Steam
Nintendo Switch: http://bit.ly/Overcooked2Switch
PS4: http://bit.ly/Overcooked2PS4
Xbox One: http://bit.ly/Overcooked2Xbox

Keep up to date with the latest Overcooked! news:

Subscribe to the Team17 newsletter: https://www.team17.com/sign-up/
Official website: https://www.team17.com/games/overcooked-2/
Follow Overcooked! on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Overcookedgame
Follow Team17 on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Team17Ltd
Like Overcooked! on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/overcookedgame/
Like Team17 on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Team17/
Team17 on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/Team17

About Team17 Digital Ltd
Founded in 1990, Team17 Digital Limited is a leading international games label that hosts the Worms franchise, Aven Colony, The Escapists, Genesis Alpha One, Overcooked, Sword Legacy: Omen, Yoku’s Island Express, Yooka-Laylee and many more from developers around the world. Visit www.team17.com for more info.
